title: Black Friday sale: Best deals on activewear, fitness accessories and wellness
text:
Black Friday sale: Best deals on activewear, fitness accessories and wellness
From stylish activewear to wellness must-haves, this year’s Black Friday deals are all about investing in yourself
By Shazrina Shamsudin -
Black Friday may be known for chaos and cart battles, but for the wellness-minded, it’s also an opportunity to upgrade your gear, refresh your routine, or finally invest in that pair of cult-favourite Lululemon leggings. From stylish activewear to wellness must-haves, these deals prove that taking care of yourself doesn’t have to wait for January (or full price).
Black Friday Sale Top Picks
- Sleek comfort for every step:
Nike Air Max Axisfor $69.75 (55% off) - Your next statement-worthy gym bag:
Adidas EQT Team Bagfor $173.40 (40% off) - Your ultimate training companion:
Garmin Forerunner 55 GPS Running Smartwatchfor $197.63 (45% off) - Deep relief when you need it most:
Breo Gun 7 Massagerfor $120.22 (39% off) - Move freely, no distractions:
Adidas by Stella McCartney True Purpose 2-in-1 Training Shortsfor $89.40 (40% off)
Amazon
When: From 20 Nov - 1 Dec
Amazon Singapore’s Black Friday 2025 sale is back — and it’s bigger than ever. Expect major markdowns across everything from electronics to home essentials, with top brands joining in on the action. The best part? The deals roll out over 12 days, from 20 November to 1 December, so there’s plenty of time to snag something (or a few things) on your wishlist.
Shopee
When: From 22 Nov - 1 Dec
There aren’t any updates on Shopee’s Black Friday sale just yet, but if last year’s event is anything to go by, shoppers can expect around four days of major markdowns across multiple categories, plus plenty of vouchers, free returns, and next-day delivery perks.
Lazada
When: TBC
Lazada hasn’t announced details for its Black Friday sale yet, but if it’s anything like last year, you can expect stackable vouchers and fresh deals dropping daily at midnight and 12pm — spanning a wide range of categories throughout the sale period.
Black Friday sales 2025: General online retailers
LNDR
30% off storewide on all online purchases.
Dyson
Up to 36% off Dyson hairdryers and 18% off Dyson styler straighteners.
Best Black Friday Activewear Deals 2025
Nike Air Max Axis
$69.75 $155 55% off
Here’s one pair of white sneakers you’ll want to add to your rotation. What makes this pair stand out is its sleek no-sew finish, airy mesh panels, and uniquely sculpted heel, all designed to keep you looking fresh and feeling comfortable, whether you’re heading to the gym or running errands.
Adidas EQT Team Bag
$173.40 $289 40%
In a sea of gym bags, this striking silver adidas tote ensures yours stands out. Both sleek and functional, it features multiple pockets to keep your essentials neatly organised.
adidas by Stella McCartney True Purpose 2-in-1 Training Shorts
$89.40 $149 40% off
Hate it when your shorts ride up mid-workout and you can’t focus? This clever two-in-one pair features a tight inner layer beneath a looser outer one, so you can move, lift, or stretch with confidence, no matter the workout.
Best Fitness Accessories on Sale This Black Friday
Garmin Forerunner 55 GPS Running Smartwatch
$197.63 $361 45% off
Whether you’re running, cycling, swimming, or doing Pilates, this smartwatch does it all. It not only tracks your timings and workouts, but also suggests personalised training plans to help you improve and reach your goals.
Best Wellness Deals to Shop This Black Friday
Breo Gun 7 Massager
$120.22 $199.90 39% off
Massage guns are a game-changer if you’re constantly dealing with post-workout soreness. This one from Breo delivers deep, targeted relief in seconds and it reaches a soothing 45°C in just five seconds with rapid heating for effective thermal therapy.
